text: The 2017 Houston Dash season is the team's fourth season as an American professional women's soccer team in the National Women's Soccer League. == Team information == === Rosters === Players and squad numbers last updated on June 17, 2017. Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules.
